location: HealthCare Plus Clinic, 123 Wellness Way. Free parking in the visitors lot on-site.
hours: Mon-Fri 8:00 AM - 6:00 PM, Sat 9:00 AM - 1:00 PM. Closed on Sundays.
insurance: We accept major plans including BlueCross, Aetna, Cigna, UnitedHealthcare, Medicare.
cancellation: Please cancel at least 24 hours before your appointment to avoid a fee.
covid: Masks are recommended for symptomatic patients.
